home.title: Tell the World About Your Collection Idea for NFTs!
home.content: We are a huge marketplace dedicated to connecting great artists of all GenHub with their fans and unique token collectors!

buy.title: Buy NFT
buy.nocollection: Looks like there are no listed NFTs in this collection. Check back later!

collection.title: Collection
collection.edit_collection_details: Edit collection details, earnings, and links.
collection.token_symbol_info: The token symbol is the shorthand way to identify your contract, which is visible on chain. For example, Azuki uses AZUKI and Bored Ape Yacht Club uses BAYC as their respective token symbols. Token symbols cannot be changed after your contract is deployed.
collection.contract_name_info: The contract name is the name of your NFT collection, which is visible on chain. This is usually your project or collection name. Contract names cannot be changed after your contract is deployed.
collection.logo_info: Your logo should be a representation of your items and will appear next to your collection name throughout. You can change your logo even after you deploy your contract.
collection.drop_page_message: Your drop page or items until you publish them.
collection.drop_page_items: Your drop page or items until you publish them.
collection.deployed_contract: That youâ€™ve deployed a contract onto the blockchain.

create.title: Create
create.drop_description: A drop is the release of a new project. This usually happens on a specified date and time. Items will be revealed after they have been purchased.
create.collection_or_item_description: Create a new NFT collection or add an NFT to an existing one. Your items will display immediately. List for sale when you're ready.

mint.title: Create an NFT
mint.subtitle: Once your item is minted you will not be able to change any of its information.
mint.select_collection: Select a collection to mint your NFT.
mint.no_collections: You don't have any collections. Create one first.
mint.error_empty_trait: Trait Type and Value cannot be empty

notFound.sorryMessage: Sorry, we couldnâ€™t find the page youâ€™re looking for.
